ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.broker.brokercore
Class BrokerCore 

java.lang.Object
  ca.utoronto.msrg.padres.broker.brokercore.BrokerCore
Direct Known Subclasses:
TesterBrokerCore 
public class BrokerCore
				
extends Object

The core of the broker. The broker is instantiated through this class. BrokerCore provides unique message ID generation, component location, message routing.

Author:
eli

Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize()
                throws BrokerCoreException
Initialize the broker. It has to be called externally; the constructor does not use this method. Components are started up in a particular order, and initialize() doesn't return until the broker is fully started.

Throws:
BrokerCoreException
